places_with_reviews.name: Shri Charbhuja Palace
address: Club Rd, opposite New Nagar Palika, Alirajpur, Madhya Pradesh 457887, India

reviews.text: Hotel is good, since no other better options available in the city, however the hotel doesn't serve meal. For food you need to go nearby restaurants. The hotel only arranges Tea, Coffee, Milk and biscuits and for that you have to pay additionally. Nothing is complementary here. Room tariff is nominal. The Location of the hotel is prime, all roads are well connected from the hotel location. The Rules of the hotel administration are strict, the management put a list of rules in the room, of do'es and don'ts.. it's my second time visit in this hotel, overall experience is good 👍.

I am giving four stars for the place provided standard service despite being in such a locality. Gazetted officers and other office bearers stay here and the hotel provides facilities accordingly. I have deducted 1 star for the unavailability of online or card payment options which can easily be arranged. Have been here previously too and experienced the same kind of facilities at the same price. Advising to book in advance as other places will not offer even half the quality.

Earlier rated 4, but now will rate 1. AC was off whole night but charged for it. Doesn't listen to logic. If you get late at night, have to stand outside for 5-10 minutes and pick keys ourselves. AC off image attached

Good hotel, well maintained rooms and good facilities. Only the lift is bit faulty that the gate closes very soon and there is no sensor to detect a person is entering it so beware while entering it. Rest the hotel is very good.
Very nice hotel and staff is good

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Sai Resort & Avenue
address: 29, MG Road, Opp. Water Tank, Ground, near Bus Stand, Alirajpur, Madhya Pradesh 457887, India

reviews.text:
Worst service I have ever seen. The hotel owner locked the door after 10 pm and no one was available at reception at night. If some emergency condition occurs or you want to do checkout at night there will be no one to listen to you and to unlock the door.

Do not book this hotel if you don't want to be kidnapped by them at night.

I had to catch train at 4 am and for that purpose needed to check out from hotel at 2 am...but the the hotel staff slept selling all horses and lacked me inside the hotel...such type of irresponsible behaviour has never been seen by me....in my life..
I kept shouting in lobby of hotel, plz open the shutter and let me go, even called the hotel staff but all in vain no one picked the call and no one listened my shouting voice...finally I missed my train...
Highly condemnable behaviour by the hotel stafff

Best place to stay in Alirajpur, very cooperative staff, offers nice service. I had been travelling for a long time, i had many clothes to be washed, tough they were not providing laundry service right now,but they still helped me out with my laundry.
5 Stars for the open air restaurant.

Nice ambiance and clean rooms, toilets are not upto the mark though but not bad either. AC and Non AC both rooms are available at reasonable rates.  Room service is also good. Very convenient to reach from bus stand almost at walking distance. Kitchen/ Restaurant facility also available there. Theres also a lounge area at reception. You wont  feel regret about it.

Good room but staff is very poor
Restaurant taste is also very good best in town but service is very poor. They just need to hire some good staff. I just have wait for 40 min to get my lunch..And plz ask them change towel and bad sheet

reviews.text: A good hotel to stay overnight onway to Vadodra/ Ahmedabad. No frill hotel at reasonable rates. This is right in middle of town and busy street with limited parking. Bathroom was clean and wish if keep plumbing also maintained in better condition.
